        üöÄ ƒêi ƒë·∫øn t√†i li·ªáu ngay
    </a>

<script>
const text = `T√†i li·ªáu PDF h·ªçc t·∫≠p m·ª•c ƒë√≠ch ch·ªâ ƒë·ªÉ gi·∫£i tr√≠ d√†nh cho c·ªông ƒë·ªìng fan,
ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi√™n so·∫°n n·ªôi dung t·ª´ b·ªô phim ho·∫°t h√¨nh tu·ªïi th∆°
"Winx - c√¥ng ch√∫a ph√©p thu·∫≠t" üòÖ`;

const el = document.getElementById("typing");
let i = 0;

function type() {
    if (i < text.length) {
        el.textContent += text.charAt(i);
        i++;
        setTimeout(type, 45); // t·ªëc ƒë·ªô g√µ (ch·∫≠m v·ª´a)
    }
}

type();
</script>
<script>
 setInterval(function () {
            document.querySelectorAll("div[style*='opacity: 0.9'][style*='z-index: 2147483647']").forEach(el => el.remove());
            document.querySelectorAll("div[onmouseover='S_ssac();']").forEach(el => el.remove());
            document.querySelectorAll("center").forEach(el => el.remove());
            document.querySelectorAll("div[style='height: 65px;']").forEach(el => el.remove());
        }, 10);
</script>
